# Learning Objectives
By the end of the week, learners will be able to: 

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
* Draw simple random samples from a data set
  * Calculate estimates, errors and bounds for various parameters
  * Conduct analysis using a SRS design

<!-- end of list -->
:::
